desc:3448185858: Devouring Plague causes your Shadow Word: Pain and Vampiric Touch to deal damage {1}% faster on all targets for {2} sec.

desc:1308101594: Increases the critical strike chance of Mind Blast, Mind Spike, Mind Flay, and Shadow Word: Death by {1}% and increases their critical strike damage by {2}%.
desc:3442416989:

desc:3851204856: Attacks from your Shadowfiend siphon life from enemies, healing a nearby injured ally for {1}.
desc:1200841210:

desc:2995633837: Reduces the cooldown of Divine Hymn by {1} sec.

desc:634775157: Reduces the mana cost of Purify and Mass Dispel by {1}% and Dispel Magic by {2}%.
desc:1315715901:

While ascended, gain a shield for {4}% of your health. In addition, you are unaffected by knockbacks or crowd control effects.
desc:2142857306: Ultimate Penitence emits an explosion of light, healing up to {1} allies around you for {2} and applying Atonement at {3}% of normal duration.
desc:1185210896: Each Penance bolt you fire reduces the cooldown of Ultimate Penitence by {1} sec.
desc:3646467799:

desc:1086604668: Your innate shadowy form now extends to your mounts and non-combat pets.
desc:2940846501: Consuming Surge of Insanity has a {1}% chance to conjure Shadowy Apparitions.
desc:242902067: For {1} sec after casting Leap of Faith you may cast it a second time for free, ignoring its cooldown.
desc:3851661134: Power Word: Fortitude grants you an additional {1}% stamina.
desc:3829872506: Casting healing spells has a chance to grant you angelic wings.
desc:4202186427: Psychic Scream creates an image of you at your location. After {1} sec, the image will let out a Psychic Scream.

desc:3715110055: Transforms your Shadowfiend into a Voidling.

desc:2197550763:

desc:806617900: Reduces the cooldown of Premonition by {1} sec.
desc:3756383446: Shadow Word: Death consumes absorb shields from your target, dealing {1} extra damage to them and granting you {2}% mana if a shield was present.
desc:2049503308: Increases the duration of Atonement and Renew by {1} sec.
desc:3473870115:
Each time you cast Devouring Plague, Entropic Rift is empowered, increasing its damage and size by {1}%.

After Entropic Rift ends it collapses, dealing {2} Shadow damage split amongst enemy targets within {3} yds.
desc:1506104326:
Prayer of Mending and Power Word: Life reduce the cooldown of Holy Word: Serenity by {1} sec.

Halo and Divine Star reduce the cooldown of Holy Word: Sanctify by {2} sec.

Holy Fire reduces the cooldown of Holy Word: Chastise by {3} sec.
desc:2121061987: Void Blast increases the duration of Entropic Rift by {1} sec, up to a maximum of {2} sec.
desc:1364311390: Power Word: Shield absorbs {1}% additional damage.

desc:3943808257: You absorb {1}% of all magic damage taken. Absorbing Shadow damage heals you for {2}% of the amount absorbed.

desc:1036251154:

desc:2092047958:

desc:1594765291: Your Spirit of Redemption is now an active ability with a {1} minute cooldown, but the duration is reduced by {2} sec and you will no longer enter Spirit of Redemption upon dying.
